Node.definition: = title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
literally: to store up events in one's mind; hence: = to experience affection for an event
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= center part of iris of eye, ≈ associated with care as this is a very sensitive part of the body that people are inclined to take proper care of

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= causative action by which humans attach objects to other objects with a rope
= one of the five long and slender projections of the human hand; ► used for writing, pointing, grasping, and other activities; ≈ sometimes used metonymically to represent the entire body
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= small, flat tablet, ◄ made of stone, ► on which words were scratched with a stylus; ≈ associated with conditions that are permanent and are not likely to change
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
= a person connected by blood or by marriage
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
literally: outsider (woman); = a woman who is the wife of someone else
literally: foreign woman; = a woman who is the wife of someone else
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded

Node.gloss: to cause to flatter|to make deceitful
Node.definition: literally: to make smooth; hence: = causative action by which humans cause events to appear well intentioned, though actually being insincere

= an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= window with bars or strips crossing each other with spaces left between

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= people of relatively young age
= state in which humans lack a particular quality that they are supposed to have
literally: heart; hence: = the ability to think for oneself as opposed to being easily swayed by what others say or do
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference
literally: road; hence: = a point to or from which a person or thing moves or faces, ◄ understood as the road between that person or thing and the point in focus

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans or deities move purposefully in a certain direction

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: utter darkness|middle of the night|dead of night
Node.definition: literally: the center of night, darkness: = reference to the middle of the night when the darkness is deepest
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= woman that sells her body for payment, making of this her profession; ≈ often associated with shame and sinful behavior
literally: hidden of heart; hence: = state in which one's intentions are unknown to others
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to be in tumult|to be in uproar|to be loud
Node.definition: = action by which humans speak loudly, ≈ often associated with a lack of wisdom
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
relational indicating a location in the direct vicinity of the point of reference

Node.gloss: to lie in wait|to lay an ambush|to lurk
Node.definition: = to go to a location where one will not be readily seen by others; ► and wait there for an opportunity to seize or attack someone or do something else that is supposed to be done when nobody else can witness it

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

Node.gloss: to put on a bold face
Node.definition: literally: to cause one's face to be strong; hence: = action by which humans wear a bold expression on their face ► in order to give other people the impression that they feel confident

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for
= relatively large piece of cloth ► used for covering a bed or couch
= causative action by which humans cover a bed or couch with a covering to prepare it for use
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide
meaning unsure; possibly: = cloth dyed in multiple colors|= cloth dyed with many different colors; ≈ considered beautiful
= woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used to cover one's bed; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious
= chips of fragrant wood, from the aloe tree (agarwood)
= fragrant substance, ◄ made from the inner bark of the cinnamon tree ► and used for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= act of having sexual relations

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= small container ◄ made of cloth; ► used to transport money, pack aromatic spices in order to put it between clothes, etc .; ≈ associated with possessions and treasures
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

Node.gloss: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)
Node.definition: literally: in (one's) hand; hence: = state of carrying an object physically in one's hand or as part of one's luggage

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= the day when the moon was in full shine; ≈ marked with religious celebrations

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to cause (someone's) heart to turn|to cause (someone) to focus their attention
Node.definition: literally: to cause (someone's) heart to turn aside; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to focus their thoughts and attention on a person, deity or activity

= causative action by which humans and deities give verbal instruction to other humans, and by which the focus is on the communication of the message rather than the content of the message; ≈ often connoting persuasive or eloquent speech
literally: smoothness of lips; hence: = act of speaking words that have the appearance of being well intentioned but are actually being insincere

Node.gloss: to lure away|to seduce|to lead astray
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to give up a certain pattern of behavior and start engaging in other activities which are usually regarded as unacceptable
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= causative action by which humans kill animals by slicing the jugular vein and windpipe with a sharp bladed instrument, ► to prepare its meat for a meal; ≈ associated with aggression
= chain placed around the ankles; ► used for prisoners, to prevent escape

= causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior
= pertaining to being foolish, which manifests itself in a lack of fear of God, unwillingness to listen to advice, much talking, and being unable to conceal one's emotions
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= a large lobed glandular organ in the abdomen, involved in processing digestive products, neutralizing toxins, and other metabolic processes
= action by which humans or animals move quickly
= generic term for a small bird; ► usually clean and can therefore be eaten
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= title used to address a person (male if in singular) who is regarded with some degree of affection, ◄ as if he were the speaker's child
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= action by which humans depart from the right pattern of behavior
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= process by which humans are emotionally wounded
literally: to cause to fall; hence: = causative process or action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to be killed or severely wounded by enemies
= state in which humans or animals are numerous and therefore potentially powerful
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
literally: room; hence: = a restricted area within a larger unit; ◄ part of the universe
= abode of the dead; ≈ considered to be a remote place, deep in the earth, with power over humankind, without remembrance, without praising God
